SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

javax.sdp
Interface SdpFactory

public interface SdpFactory

The SdpFactory enables applications to encode and decode SDP messages.

The SdpFactory can be used to construct a SessionDescription object programmatically.

The SdpFactory can also be used to construct a SessionDescription based on the contents of a String.

Please refer to IETF RFC 2327 for a description of SDP. Created by IntelliJ IDEA. User: kporter Date: Nov 5, 2003 Time: 12:30:55 AM

Version:
$Id$

Method Detail

createSessionDescription

public SessionDescription createSessionDescription()
                                            throws SdpException
Creates a new, empty SessionDescription. The session is set as follows:

v=0

o=this.createOrigin ("user", InetAddress.getLocalHost().toString());

s=-

t=0 0

Returns:
a new, empty SessionDescription.
Throws:
SdpException - if there is a problem constructing the SessionDescription.

createSessionDescription

public SessionDescription createSessionDescription(String s)
                                            throws SdpParseException
Creates a SessionDescription populated with the information contained within the String parameter.

Note: unknown field types should not cause exceptions.

Parameters:
s - the sdp message that is to be parsed.
Returns:
a populated SessionDescription object.
Throws:
SdpParseException - if there is a problem parsing the String.

createMedia

public Media createMedia(String media,
                         int port,
                         int numPorts,
                         String transport,
                         Vector staticRtpAvpTypes)
                  throws SdpException
Returns Media object with the specified properties.

Parameters:
media - the media type, eg "audio"
port - port number on which to receive media
numPorts - number of ports used for this media stream
transport - transport type, eg "RTP/AVP"
staticRtpAvpTypes - vector of String of RTP/AVP types.
Returns:
The new Media field instance.
Throws:
SdpException - if there is a problem constructing the Media.

                           String address)
                    throws SdpException
Returns Origin object with the specified properties.

Parameters:
userName - the user name.
address - the IP4 encoded address.
Returns:
The new Origin field instance.
Throws:
SdpException - if there is a problem constructing the Origin.

createOrigin

public Origin createOrigin(String userName,
                           long sessionId,
                           long sessionVersion,
                           String networkType,
                           String addrType,
                           String address)
                    throws SdpException
Returns Origin object with the specified properties.

Parameters:
userName - String containing the user that created the string.
sessionId - long containing the session identifier.
sessionVersion - long containing the session version.
networkType - String network type for the origin (usually "IN").
addrType - String address type (usually "IP4").
address - String IP address usually the address of the host.
Returns:
Origin object with the specified properties.
Throws:
SdpException - if there is a problem constructing the Origin.

createMediaDescription

public MediaDescription createMediaDescription(String media,
                                               int port,
                                               int numPorts,
                                               String transport,
                                               int[] staticRtpAvpTypes)
                                        throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                               SdpException
Returns MediaDescription object with the specified properties. The returned object will respond to Media.getMediaFormats(boolean) with a Vector of media formats.

Parameters:
media - the media type, eg "audio"
port - port number on which to receive media
numPorts - number of ports used for this media stream
transport - transport type, eg "RTP/AVP"
staticRtpAvpTypes - list of RTP/AVP media payload types which should be specified by the returned MediaDescription
Returns:
The new MediaDescription object with the specified properties.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if passed an invalid RTP/AVP payload type
SdpException - if passed other invalid arguments.
See Also:
<{link @SdpConstants}>, RFC 1890

createMediaDescription

public MediaDescription createMediaDescription(String media,
                                               int port,
                                               int numPorts,
                                               String transport,
                                               String[] formats)
                                        throws SdpException
Returns MediaDescription object with the specified properties. The returned object will respond to Media.getMediaFormats(boolean) with a Vector of String objects specified by the 'formats argument.

Parameters:
media - the media type, eg "audio"
port - port number on which to receive media
numPorts - number of ports used for this media stream
transport - transport type, eg "RTP/AVP"
formats - list of formats which should be specified by the returned MediaDescription
Returns:
The new MediaDescription object with the specified properties.
Throws:
SdpException - if an error occurs.

formatMulticastAddress

public String formatMulticastAddress(String addr,
                                     int ttl,
                                     int numAddrs)
Returns a String containing the computed form for a multi-connection address.

Parameters:
addr - connection address
ttl - time to live (TTL) for multicast addresses
numAddrs - number of addresses used by the connection
Returns:
a String containing the computed form for a multi-connection address.

createConnection

public Connection createConnection(String netType,
                                   String addrType,
                                   String addr,
                                   int ttl,
                                   int numAddrs)
                            throws SdpException
Returns a Connection object with the specified properties.

Parameters:
netType - network type, eg "IN" for "Internet"
addrType - address type, eg "IP4" for IPv4 type addresses
addr - connection address
ttl - time to live (TTL) for multicast addresses
numAddrs - number of addresses used by the connection
Returns:
The new Connection object with the specified properties.
Throws:
SdpException - if there is a problem constructing the Connection.

createConnection

public Connection createConnection(String netType,
                                   String addrType,
                                   String addr)
                            throws SdpException
Returns a Connection object with the specified properties and no TTL and a default number of addresses (1).

Parameters:
netType - network type, eg "IN" for "Internet"
addrType - address type, eg "IP4" for IPv4 type addresses
addr - connection address
Returns:
The new Connection object with the specified properties.
Throws:
SdpException - if there is a problem creating the Connection object.

createConnection

public Connection createConnection(String addr,
                                   int ttl,
                                   int numAddrs)
                            throws SdpException
Returns a Connection object with the specified properties and a network and address type of "IN" and "IP4" respectively.

Parameters:
addr - connection address
ttl - time to live (TTL) for multicast addresses
numAddrs - number of addresses used by the connection
Returns:
The new Connection object with the specified properties.
Throws:
SdpException - if there is a problem constructing the Connection.

createConnection

public Connection createConnection(String addr)
                            throws SdpException
Returns a Connection object with the specified address. This is equivalent to 
   createConnection("IN", "IP4", addr);

Parameters:
addr - connection address
Returns:
a Connection object with the specified address.
Throws:
SdpException - if there is a problem creating the Connection object.

createTime

public Time createTime(Date start,
                       Date stop)
                throws SdpException
Returns a Time with the specified start and stop times.

Parameters:
start - start time
stop - stop time
Returns:
a Time specification with the specified start and stop times.
Throws:
SdpException - if there is a problem creating the Time object.

createTime

public Time createTime()
                throws SdpException
Returns an unbounded Time specification (i.e., "t=0 0").

Returns:
an unbounded Time specification (i.e., "t=0 0").
Throws:
SdpException - if there is a problem creating the Time object.

createRepeatTime

public RepeatTime createRepeatTime(int repeatInterval,
                                   int activeDuration,
                                   int[] offsets)
Returns a RepeatTime object with the specified interval, duration, and time offsets.

Parameters:
repeatInterval - the "repeat interval" in seconds
activeDuration - the "active duration" in seconds
offsets - the list of offsets relative to the start time of the Time object with which the returned RepeatTime will be associated.
Returns:
The new RepeatTime object with the specified interval, duration, and time offsets.

createTimeZoneAdjustment

public TimeZoneAdjustment createTimeZoneAdjustment(Date d,
                                                   int offset)
Returns a TimeZoneAdjustment record.

Parameters:
d - the Date at which the adjustment is going to take place.
offset - the adjustment in number of seconds relative to the start time of the SessionDescription with which this object is associated.
Returns:
a TimeZoneAdjustment record.

findSessions

public Vector findSessions(String source)
Returns a collection of Strings containing session description.

Parameters:
source - String containing session descriptions.
Returns:
a collection of Strings containing session descriptions.

getDateFromNtp

public Date getDateFromNtp(long ntpTime)
Returns a Date object for a given NTP date value.

Parameters:
ntpTime - the NTP long value to be converted to a Date.
Returns:
a new Date instance for a given NTP date value.

getNtpTime

public long getNtpTime(Date d)
Returns a long containing the NTP value for a given Java Date.

Parameters:
d - the Date value to be converted to a NTP long.
Returns:
a long containing the NTP value for a given Java Date.
